### computeImportForModule() {#af806f9d842ec97d31bd9550eb338f678}

<MemberDefinition

Given the list of globals defined in a module, compute the list of imports as well as the list of &quot;exports&quot;, i.e.

the list of symbols referenced from another module (that may require promotion).
